This module implements procs to work with both RefAptosAccount and RefMultiSigAccountstd importsthird party imports

                       client: AptosClient): Future[float] {....stackTrace: false.}
proc buildTransaction[T: TransactionPayload](
    account: RefAptosAccount | RefMultiSigAccount; client: AptosClient;
    max_gas_amount = -1; gas_price = -1; txn_duration: int64 = -1): Future[
    RawTransaction[T]] {....stackTrace: false.}

params :

account -> account to build transaction for max_gas_amount -> maximum amount of gas that can be sent for this transaction gas_price -> price in octa unit per gas txn_duration -> amount of time in seconds till transaction timeout
